FILL_FORM_BEFORE_DRIVER: Fill Out the Form Below Before The Driver Arrives To The Site
ORDER_NUMBER_NOTE: This number typically starts with '8' , if your load has multiple orders, please enter the first order number
DEST_STATE_NOTE: For U.S. orders, enter the two-letter state abbreviation (e.g., New Jersey â†’ NJ). For international orders, enter 'INT'.
ENTER_PHONE_FOR_ORDER: Enter your phone number to access your assigned order
SEND_VERIFICATION_CODE: We'll send a verification code to confirm your identity
LOGIN_PROMPT: Press on Login To Enter Your Phone Number
SUBMIT_ORDER_PROMPT: Press on Submit Order to Fill An Order Pick Up Form
VERIFICATION_SENT_TO: We've sent a verification code to:
SMS_TERMS_SUBTITLE: By opting in to receive SMS messages from Arizona Beverages:
SMS_TERMS_1: You agree to receive automated SMS messages for verification purposes
SMS_TERMS_2: Message frequency varies based on your activity
SMS_TERMS_4: You can opt out by replying STOP to any message
SMS_TERMS_5: For help, contact support at support@arizonabeverages.com
SMS_PRIVACY_SUBTITLE: How we handle your SMS data:
SMS_PRIVACY_1: We only use your phone number for verification purposes
SMS_PRIVACY_2: We do not share your phone number with third parties
SMS_PRIVACY_3: Verification codes are temporary and expire automatically
SMS_PRIVACY_4: You can request deletion of your data by contacting support
SMS_CONSENT: I consent to receive a SMS verification code from Arizona Beverages. By clicking on 'Send Code', you agree to receive SMS messages containing verification codes for accessing your assigned orders. Message and data rates may apply.
WAITING_FOR_YARD_MANAGER_TO_UPDATE_DESTI: Waiting for Yard Manager to Update Destination
